sentence.Network_en: Unfortunately, these attempts to self-medicate only make things worse.
sentence.Network_cn: 不幸地是，这些”自我治愈“的做法只让情况恶化。

sentence.Network_en: They started out a lot of talk about Medicate and Medicare.
sentence.Network_cn: 接着他们开始谈论了很多药物治疗和医疗保健方案.

sentence.Network_en: To rinse or medicate ( the mouth or throat ) by gargling.
sentence.Network_cn: 以漱口的方式清洗或治疗 ( 口腔或咽喉 )
